$async
let ds= await
READFILE("data/ACMD_LIB.js")

v.lib=eval(ds)


SET_DISPLAY_ID_LIST(
["rule1"])
progressUpdate("歸零")

await G(`G01 F200`)


let  Y_areaTargets=[1500,1300,1100]

let Y_aFactor=0.7

let R11_areaTargets=Y_areaTargets

let R11_aFactor=0.7


v.SYSINFO=await v.lib.CalibSeq(
Y_areaTargets,
Y_aFactor,
R11_areaTargets,
R11_aFactor,1
)


progressUpdate("歸零OK")
await delay(2000)
SET_DISPLAY_ID_LIST(undefined)

$async
await G(`G01 Z1_0 F200`)
console.log(v.SYSINFO)
await G(`G01 Y${v.lib.Y_Camera-1} F200`)

await waitUserCheck()

await G(`G01 R11_0 Z1_${v.lib.Z_Camera+17}  `)
await waitUserCheck()
await G(`G01 R11_-30`)
await waitUserCheck()




await G(`G01 Y${v.lib.Y_Camera} Z1_${v.lib.Z_Camera+17}  F200`)

$async

let Y=373-5.5
let Z=-37
let ACC="ACC100 DEA200"
let Delay=1000
await G(`G01 R11_0 F280`)

await G(`M42 P${25} T0`)
await G(`M42 P${26} T0`)
await G(`M42 P${25} S1`)
await G(`M42 P${26} S1`)

let curPos=0
for(let i=0;;)
{


let info = 
await waitUserSelects("",
[{
text:"++",
opts:[0,1,2,3,4,5],
default:curPos
},
{
text:"Suck",
opts:[0,1],
default:0
},{
text:"Z",
opts:[Z-5,Z-1,Z,Z+1,Z+5],
default:Z
},
])
curPos=info[0]
i=curPos
Z=info[2]
await G(`G01 Z1_0  ACC200 DEA200`)


await G(`G01 Y${Y+5.5*(i%6)} Z1_0   ${ACC}`)

await G(`G01 Z1_${Z}  ${ACC}`)

await G(`M42 P${25} T${info[1]}`)


await G(`G04 P${Delay}`)

await G(`G01 Z1_0  ${ACC}`)


console.log(info);

}
